conversation_log.valor_response:
I see we're having some technical difficulties with the automation tool right now. Let me help you directly with this issue. Could you share a few more details about your JWT setup:

3. Which authentication library/framework are you using?

This will help me give you the most targeted solution to fix the expiration timing.
